text: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفۡـِٔدَتَهُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ كَمَا لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ وَنَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

translation.en: And We will turn away their hearts and their eyes just as they refused to believe in it the first time. And We will leave them in their transgression, wandering blindly
translation.id: Dan (begitu pula) Kami memalingkan hati dan penglihatan mereka seperti pertama kali mereka tidak beriman kepadanya (Alquran), dan Kami biarkan mereka bingung dalam kesesatan
